info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 12:40PM EDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower affecting Hardin, Floyd, Meade, Harrison, Jefferson and Clark Counties.
Ohio River at Cannelton Lock and Dam affecting Hancock, Breckinridge, Perry and Crawford Counties.
Ohio River at Clifty Creek affecting Jefferson and Trimble Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...
Ohio River at McAlpine Upper affecting Jefferson, Clark, Floyd and Oldham Counties.
Ohio River at Tell City affecting Hancock and Perry Counties.
.Heavy rain from the past several days has caused the river to rise with additional rainfall expected through Sunday.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at McAlpine Lower.
* WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 65.0 feet, Parts of US 31W (Dixie Highway) flood from I-265 (Gene Synder Freeway) interchange to West Point KY. Riverfront parks in Clarksville and New Albany flood. At 66.0 feet, Lock is closed. Floodgates at Riverport are closed. At 67.0 feet, Blackiston Mill Road floods at Silver Creek in Clarksville.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 53.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 45.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 68.1 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 55.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 67.1 feet on 02/26/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by Sunday afternoon at 200 PM EDT /100 PM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Clark, IN; Floyd, IN; Harrison, IN; Hardin, KY; Jefferson, KY; Meade, KY
